page.title: 02TRANSPORT (roads) 1.
page.content: We made a{survey}of the traffic for the main coastal route from Whitby to Guisborough{(A173),}at Skelton on {Wednesday 3rd. July}between 9.0 am. and 3.0pm. Throughout these hours we found there was a{greater traffic flow}to the{west}of the country than to the east, by about{10%.}This suggests many vehicles use Saltburn Lane (North from 664190) probably for access to the housing and industrial estates, or to the coast. Overall{traffic-flow,}both east and west, equalled{350 to 400 vehicles {an hour(vph)}in each direction. After {9.0am}traffic built up from a steady flow of{700vph.,}subsided slightly to about{600vph. at 12.0,}building up to {800 vehicles at 3.0pm.
